titles.title: A bill to provide for the temporary suspension of certain duties on two-stroke cycle piston engines and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/23/1988--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide for the suspension of duty, through December 31, 1992, on certain two-stroke cycle piston engines to be installed in vehicles designed for snow travel, golf carts, and nonamphibious all-terrain vehicles designed to carry one passenger.
